name: Death Metal
description: Heavily distorted, down-tuned guitars, palm-muted, tremolo-picked riffs, double-kick and blast beat percussion, chromatic chord progressions, minor keys, abrupt changes in tempo, and guttural vocals.

children.name: Brutal Death Metal
children.description: Emphasizes abrasiveness, chunky rhythmic atonal riffs, and low guttural vocals.

children.name: Brutal Death Metal
children.description: Emphasizes abrasiveness, chunky rhythmic atonal riffs, and low guttural vocals.

children.name: Death 'n' Roll
children.description: Incorporates a groove-oriented, Hard Rock-influenced approach while retaining heavily distorted rhythm guitars and gruff or occasionally growled vocals.

children.name: Death 'n' Roll
children.description: Incorporates a groove-oriented, Hard Rock-influenced approach while retaining heavily distorted rhythm guitars and gruff or occasionally growled vocals.

children.name: Deathgrind
children.description: Combines the intensity and high-pitched screams of Grindcore with the technicality and low guttural vocals of Death Metal.

children.name: Deathgrind
children.description: Combines the intensity and high-pitched screams of Grindcore with the technicality and low guttural vocals of Death Metal.

children.name: Melodic Death Metal
children.description: Utilizes the guitar harmonies and melodic focus of Heavy Metal while generally retaining down-tuned, heavily distorted guitars and a harsh, aggressive sound.

children.name: Melodic Death Metal
children.description: Utilizes the guitar harmonies and melodic focus of Heavy Metal while generally retaining down-tuned, heavily distorted guitars and a harsh, aggressive sound.

children.name: Technical Death Metal
children.description: Focuses on challenging, demanding songwriting and instrumental skill.
